    • setCallback

      public DeployGateSdkConfiguration.Builder setCallback(DeployGateCallback callback)
      Set a callback of the communication events between DeployGate client app and this app.
      Parameters:
      callback - Set an instance of callback. The reference won't be released. Please use DeployGate.registerCallback(DeployGateCallback, boolean) for memory sensitive works.
      Returns:
      self
